name: ClinicalQuestion
0:
”Alexa, open Clinical Question”
”Alexa, start Clinical Question”
”Alexa, launch Clinical Question”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clinical question
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill asks a question on whether the participant has taken their medication and what time did they take it. We are developing the skills for Pharmaceutical and Biotech companies and this is one illustration of a public skill. This skill is not affiliated with live clinical trials. The skill does not collect, process or store any Protected Health Information (PHI)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
